Children older than 3 years with high-risk medulloblastoma    Standard treatment of high-risk medulloblastoma in children older than 3 years includes the following:         - Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible. This is followed by a larger dose of radiation therapy to the brain and spinal cord than the dose given for average-risk medulloblastoma.
